::Spears::

She watched as her quills hit Ramulus, leaving deep gashes in his 
chest plates. She slashed at him again, but he dissappeared infront 
of her eyes.  She felt something his her shoulder. She felt the shock 
of two programs trying to fight each other.  She dropped her spears 
and clutched at her shoulder, putting her hand over the chip. She 
fell to her knees and screamed out. Her eyes flashed and she fell to 
the ground, going into stasis lock.  The two programs were cancelling 
each other out and shorting out her circuits.  A small ribbon of 
smoke escaped out of her shoulder and around her neck. 







--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen/Slayer::
> 
> Ramulus jumps back as Spears stabs at him, her quills leaving a 
rather deep 
> slash in his chest. He growls, firing again from his anti-chip 
weapon at her. 
> HIs other hand slides down to his cloaking device, activating it.
> 
> Ramulus dissapears from view, firing off another anti-chip beam at 
Spears.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm growls as weaponfire whizzes by his head, spinning around 
to see 
> where it was coming from.
> 
> He dives, flying back up and firing at the source with a few 
charges.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> (Proto wasn't firing)
> 
> Proto grunts as a shot hits him in the chest, sending him spiraling 
a bit 
> before regaining stability. He spins around, firing back at Bullet, 
not sure 
> where to aim.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen runs toward Prebon, the forest sizzling around him. He 
was 
> holding his rifle in one end, firing at Prebon, and the anti-chip 
weapon in 
> the other, firing on Spears.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slayer growls as he looks up at the weaponfire above him. It was 
not his 
> concern, his concern was Ramulus..
> 
> The bot's jetpack activates, sending him flying toward Ramulus' 
location, 
> firing a shot toward the forest as he flew.
